page.title: 20My Typical Weekend
page.content: On Saturday I get up at about 7.30am and have my breakfast and then I get washed and dressed. I pack my bag for gym. It takes twenty minutes to get to my gymnastics class. I get home about 2.30pm and have my lunch. Then I get changed and watch television. I sometimes go out and play in the back garden. We have tea at 7.30pm and I go to bed about 10.30pm having watched some more television. On Sunday I usually get up at 9.00am. I get washed and dressed and have my breakfast. I will play with my brother or watch television if there is anything on. We have a traditional Sunday dinner at 1.00pm. I play till teatime. After tea I have a bath and wash my hair and, having watched television, go to bed.
